document_data.name: Spider Blood
document_data.mainbody: '''Spider Blood''' was a variety of [[wine]] exported out of the [[Underdark]] and found in [[Ravens Bluff]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Spider Blood was a quality dark red wine.
document_data.History: As of the mid-14{{th}} century DR, Spider Blood could be purchased in limited quantities at [[The Underdark Café]], a new establishment run by [[Vincent Berelegond]] in the city of Ravens Bluff. Spider Blood was offered to the patrons of the Café during its grand opening for the price of thee [[gold]] [[coin]]s per serving.
